registered stock.translation[0].definiti: stock where ownership is recorded on a list, and which is not always shown on SHARE CERTIFICATEs
If your stock is held in bearer form, you might find that settlement is quicker if you switch the holding into registered stock.
used to talk about the stockmarket where a particular stock is traded
The bank’s London-registered stock was up 17.5 to £14.76.
